snippet.title: Let's Play A Game Drawn Completely On the Nintendo 3ds
snippet.description:
Watch me play some of the Ordinary World Game demo, I go through the basics of the game and play some mini games!
Theres a kickstarter going now to help fund the full game!
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/ordinaryworld/ordinary-world-the-video-game-0

#indiegame #3ds #flipnote #cozygames #kickstarter
